mapper.select: SELECT c.id, cu.id AS uid, ca.name AS catename, p.id AS pid, p.name AS pname, p.price as pprice, c.regdate, c.cnt FROM cart c INNER JOIN cust cu ON c.uid = cu.id INNER JOIN product p ON c.pid = p.id INNER JOIN cate ca ON ca.id = p.cid WHERE c.id = #{id}
